body:
Follow-up to #23077. Leaving this in draft until that pull is merged.

```
$ ./src/bitcoin-cli -addrinfo
{
  "addresses_known": {
    "ipv4": 46761,
    "ipv6": 10080,
    "onion": 7933,
    "i2p": 37,
    "cjdns": 1,
    "total": 64811
  }
}
```
```
$ ./src/bitcoin-cli -netinfo 
Bitcoin Core client v22.99.0-deb6223d4c55 - server 70016/Satoshi:22.99.0(@jon)/

in         0       0       3       4       0       7
out        5       0       9       5       1      20       3       9
total      5       0      12       9       1      27
```

title: Add CJDNS network to -addrinfo and -netinfo
